title: Lori Vallow Daybell restored to competency, murder trial to proceed - East Idaho News
content:
1. Lori Vallow Daybell restored to competency, murder trial to proceed  East Idaho News

  5. Lori Vallow, charged with killing her children, ruled mentally fit to stand trial  NBC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: ST. ANTHONY — Lori Vallow Daybell has been restored to competency and will face a jury trial on murder charges. District Judge Steven Boyce issued a written order Monday morning saying Daybell is fit to proceed and ordered that she be released from a Department of Health and Welfare facility where she has been undergoing …
